title: Fun Christmas Movies to Watch in 2025
summary: This article talks about new Christmas movies in 2025. The author watched many of them in one day to help people decide which ones are good to watch during the holidays. One movie is about the Jonas Brothers, who are stuck in the UK and try to get home for Christmas while an evil Santa stops them. Another movie has a Hollywood star named Brad Mack who thinks he is in a fancy play but is actually in a funny pantomime with other actors. The article rates the movies with Christmas tree symbols to show how much fun they are. It says some movies are great for fans but might not be as good for others. The goal is to share which movies are worth watching to get into the Christmas spirit.
